Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2016 03:00PM Shalimar630 wrote: mmshea, I'm so sorry you had to join this club, but there are many here to assist you and to lean on. If your place of treatment, clinic or hospital has a support group, I would recommend looking into. They are supportive and very knowledgeable. They can help, let them... Also, don't be afraid to ask and ask. This is your treatment, you have a say. I'm a couple years out, this forum helped so much. Take care, deep breaths.
